author: struberg
msg: OWB-590 give ThirdpartyBeans a distinct hashCode and equals
This fixes an ugly bug because up till now it used the hashCode method
from AbstractOwbBean which was the same for all ThirdpartyBean instances...

author: hboutemy
msg: declared apache.snapshots repository like in ASF pom for use when parent is SNAPSHOT

author: elecharny
msg: o Created a DefaultModifictaion constructor taking an AttributeType with no value
o Renamed the userIndinces() method to getUserIndices()
o Renamed the systemIndinces() method to getSystemIndices()
o The Store.modify method now takes a Modification... instead of a List<Modification>
o Renamed the AbstractStore.protect method to checkInitialized for clarity
o Removed the Store.modify method which takes a Entry as a parameter
o Fixed the tests and the code using Store to reflect the changes done above
